node.title: My favorite hoax was:
node.choices: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_War_of_the_Worlds_%28radio%29|the War of the Worlds radio broadcast] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sawing_off_of_Manhattan_Island|Sawing Off of Manhattan Island] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Society_for_Indecency_to_Naked_Animals|Society for Indecency to Naked Animals] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uri_Geller|Uri Geller] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dihydrogen_monoxide_hoax|Dihydrogen Monoxide] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crop_circles|Crop circles] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yellowcake_forgery|Yellowcake forgery] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piltdown_Man|Piltdown Man] [http://www.perl.com/pub/2001/04/01/parrot.htm|Parrot prank] [http://humor.about.com/gi/dynamic/offsite.htm?site=http://www.museumofhoaxes.com/top100.html|the Great Spaghetti harvest] other (but you have to post a note specifying your favorite)
